body:
Oh, i see. makestatic.go needs to run.

And finally, the `personalizeInstallInstructions` hides some things after download, which still will work:
https://golang.org/doc/install?download=go1.5.darwin-amd64.pkg
(or locally)
http://127.0.01:8080/doc/install?download=go1.5.darwin-amd64.pkg

I'll submit a CL.
